base_description: The circuit structure includes 5 nodes and 9 interconnecting branches. The passive components include 4 resistor(s). Energy is supplied through 1 voltage source(s), 2 current source(s). Additionally, 1 controlled source(s) are present. Measurement setup includes 2 current measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 8 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Update voltage source 1: change its value from 58V to 29V.
Change the current supply (labeled 1) from 53A to 1A.
Change the current supply (labeled 2) from 39mA to 200kA.
